profile.name: Cankat Tilki
profile.title: PhD Student in Mathematics
profile.bio: I am Cankat Tilki, a PhD student in the Department of Mathematics at Virginia Tech. I work with Dr. Serkan Gugercin on data-driven modeling of dynamical systems. Outside research, I enjoy practicing aikido and traveling.
profile.research_summary: My research focuses on data-driven modeling and model reduction for dynamical systems. I am particularly interested in EDMD from a Koopman-operator perspective, with the goal of constructing lower-dimensional representations that capture the essential behavior of complex systems. My current work explores both theoretical and computational aspects of these approaches, with an emphasis on methods that are reliable, interpretable, and broadly applicable.
